Summary: The letter is a welcome message from NUS-ISS to a participant in their lifelong learning journey. The organization aims to provide skills and knowledge for professional and personal growth. The course materials are protected by copyright and should not be shared or reproduced. NUS-ISS offers a wide range of programmes in various industries and is dedicated to supporting growth through multiple learning pathways. Participants can reach out for assistance or information on various programmes. The letter is signed by Yum Hui Yuen, Director of Executive Education & Corporate Services at NUS-ISS.
